item.title: Day 24

  • Stereo Camera Setup: Worked hands-on with the stereo cam configuration for the startup project. Focused on tuning parameters and verifying setup stability.
  • Project Discussions: Had an in-depth discussion with the team lead regarding important updates and milestones. Planning for the next sprint began.
  • Competitive Programming: Spent time learning new CP tactics, reinforcing problem-solving techniques, and brushing up concepts.

One of those solid days of technical work, strategic planning, and personal growth.

Great balance between tech, exercise, and consistency today.
